titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude capital gains on sales and exchanges of residences purchased in a foreclosure sale.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude capital gains on sales and exchanges of residences purchased in a foreclosure sale.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income gain from the sale or exchange of a residential property acquired at foreclosure or by operation of law after default on a mortgage.
